question:
Consider the following code:
\"\"\"python
myList = [1, 2, 3]
myTuple = (1, 2, 3)
myList[0] = 0
myTuple[0] = 0
\"\"\"What can we expect from this Python code?

choices.choice: We will receive a TypeError at myList[0] = 0.
The code will execute without any issues.
We will receive a TypeError at myTuple[0] = 0.
